name: 【GGJ 2022】 A (B) Normal Day
description:
“You （Can）not Step Into the Same River Twice”

                                                                                                   - Heraclitus

This is a game about your normal day. In the game, you will experience the normal day of a normal employee. Sitting on your comfortable chair and looking at your lovely desk, you will find that you can easily decide what to do or not do. Each decision will bring you to some normal storyline. Enjoy your normal day and hope you can end the day safe and sound. (Do not forget to click the picture on the wall lol (Temporarily this game only has Chinese language version *Global Game Jam 2022
